column3: str

Vuyargur is facing a dire tool shortage.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the masonry supervisor at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.
Deliver the requested items to the masonry supervisor.
Speak with Vuyargur.
Speak with the masonry supervisor at Zirgorteh the Open-armed.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),9))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to the masonry supervisor</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),10))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to the masonry supervisor</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),11))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to the masonry supervisor</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),8))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to the masonry supervisor</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),12))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to the masonry supervisor</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),13))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to the masonry supervisor</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),14))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to the masonry supervisor</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),15))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Synthesize <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/><Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to the masonry supervisor</If><Else/></If></If></If></If></If></If></If></If>.
Speak with Vuyargur.

Ah, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Just the <If(PlayerParameter(4))>woman<Else/>man</If> I wanted to see. We have a shortage of tools at Masons' Work, and I was hoping you could help shore up our supplies.
This is rather an urgent task, as I would rather not have everyone idle for too long. Go speak with the supervisor at Masons' Work to find out exactly what we need.
You're the one helping us with the new tools? I'm glad to have you─we didn't expect so many eager hands to join us, and now we have to make them productive. So let's get right to it.
We need hammers, and lots of them. Luckily, there should be more than enough materials in this crate.
We need measuring tools, and lots of them. Luckily, there should be more than enough materials in this crate.
We need polish for the stone, and lots of it. Luckily, there should be more than enough materials in this crate.
The crate appears to be filled to the brim with sundry materials─none of which you require at this time.
You obtain additional crafting materials from the crate.
Finished yet? I hope so─our workers are getting restless without a task to keep them busy.
Ah, these will do. These will do splendidly! I'll pass these around straightaway.
With the right tools in the right hands, everything seems to be back on schedule.
This is among the largest projects I have ever helped oversee, and there simply are not enough experienced stonemasons to meet our demand. So we have begun teaching the new volunteers.
Such skills are not learned overnight, as you well know, and every mason worth his salt has his fair share of worn-down tools to thank for his mastery.
What you made us today will be put through its paces, you can be sure. If we need more─and I have a feeling we will─I hope we can count on you again.
